I've now moved into full time Ruby on Rails development. I still bring my experience in Document Management and Enterprise solutions to bear on problems. I'm practicing Agile development in my new role (and loving it).

I now live in Erskineville which is not quite as close to the city, but has awesome parks and is close to the great culture of Newtown.

I work as a Document Management Consultant. I do a little bit of development in my spare time, mostly using Ruby, though I've been known to use everything from Java to Python. I live in Darlinghurst, which is a stone's throw from the Sydney CBD (very handy) and spitting distant to Kings Cross (not so handy).
